description: A change from a heavy fruit cake, very yummy.
name: Pumpkin Apricot Fruit Cake Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500g mixed fruit (sultanas, dates, dried apricots, raisins)
1 cup pumpkin, mashed well drain and cold

recipeInstructions.text: When mixture is cold add eggs, flours and pumpkin mix well put into tin If you wish you could decorate with almonds before putting in oven. Bake 90 mins at 160Â°C. Allow to cool before cutting

In a large saucepan add fruit, butter, sugar, golden syrup, and apricot nectar bring to boil and simmer about 10 mins fruit will plump up. Remove from stove add bi carb stir until it no longer froths allow to cool.
Line a 20cm cake tin, line sides as well helps cake to keep shape allow sides to be about 2-3 cm over top of tin.
